results.content:
Mark has kept it really simple, and even though a few years back I did web development, it was a great refresher. Now I am planning to go for the full certification course so that I can be ready to work on my website for which I am procrastinating for years together. Mark has very good pace, neither too fast nor too slow. Anyone can understand the course well. Exercises are short, simple and most importantly relevant.

I am pretty sure, after completing the full certification course, I'll be able to bring up my website at last. 

Most important point which I want to highlight here is. If you just learn on your own from internet, and learn everything by following up tutorials on w3schools or other good sites on internet, you will just finish up some courses but probably will still find out the same difficulties while starting out for your first website. Using them more as reference sites is better idea. 
Learning from someone who has years of experience make your learning experience quite quick and you get a piece of instructor's experienced brain at your disposal in just few hours. In this case, Mark has done really amazing job, now it's your job to make most of it by immediately putting it in to action.

response.content: Thank you so much Gaurav for such a perfect review! Thank you for enrolling and I'm glad that you really enjoyed taking this course!
response.content_html: Thank you so much Gaurav for such a perfect review! Thank you for enrolling and I'm glad that you really enjoyed taking this course!

results.content: I was pleased with the overall quality of this course.  I found Mark enthusiastic in his approach and he provided clear instructions.  The only downside was  that a beginner like myself will be better off following the instructor each step along the way, almost like the way it is taught at teamtreehouse.com.  Still, I benefited and have an overall understanding of html, css and javascript.  Thanks Mark.
results.content_html: I was pleased with the overall quality of this course. I found Mark enthusiastic in his approach and he provided clear instructions. The only downside was that a beginner like myself will be better off following the instructor each step along the way, almost like the way it is taught at teamtreehouse.com. Still, I benefited and have an overall understanding of html, css and javascript. Thanks Mark.

results.content: This course provides a great introduction to web development.  Starting with various development tools, explaining HTML, CSS, and lightly touching on JavaScript (which was appropriate, as an entire programming language, it has many full courses to cover it separately) and then showing how the 3 work together.  It provides a great launching point to show how basic web sites work, and how to create them yourself.
results.content_html: This course provides a great introduction to web development. Starting with various development tools, explaining HTML, CSS, and lightly touching on JavaScript (which was appropriate, as an entire programming language, it has many full courses to cover it separately) and then showing how the 3 work together. It provides a great launching point to show how basic web sites work, and how to create them yourself.

results.content:
A beginners course which I would certainly recommend. 

Just a few hours of lectures and exercises which is really well explained by an instructor who clearly has enthusiasm for what he does. 

It's pretty short, but perfect to test web development out before you commit  to a longer and more detailed course if it's something that interests you. 

The cost I believe is in sync with what is covered and the amount of content you get.
results.content_html:
A beginners course which I would certainly recommend.

Just a few hours of lectures and exercises which is really well explained by an instructor who clearly has enthusiasm for what he does.

It's pretty short, but perfect to test web development out before you commit to a longer and more detailed course if it's something that interests you.

The cost I believe is in sync with what is covered and the amount of content you get.

results.content:
I must say that this course is good. It introduced me to CSS and JavaScript and a bit advanced HTML. 

I found the second section lab exercise a little hard, I didn't know what color to use and had to look at some CSS References to help. I found the third section lab exercise awesome. It is a good feeling to create a certificate generator and receiving one after that.

I found Web Development a little hard (Since I need experience in 2 technologies and 1 programming language) but, I'll try to get use to it. At least I tried.

Mark Lassoff, thank you for creating this course to introduce us all what Web Development feels like. Looking forward for more courses from you (If I could ever afford it xD). 4 Stars.
results.content_html:

I found Web Development a little hard (Since I need experience in 2 technologies and 1 programming language) but, I'll try to get use to it. At least I tried.

Mark Lassoff, thank you for creating this course to introduce us all what Web Development feels like. Looking forward for more courses from you (If I could ever afford it xD). 4 Stars.
